snippet: The winners include John Lewis Gaddis’s biography of George F. Kennan and the play “Water by the Spoonful,” by Quiara Alegría Hudes.
abstract: List of Pulitzer Prize winners for letters, drama and music.
lead_paragraph: The winners include John Lewis Gaddis’s biography of George F. Kennan and the play “Water by the Spoonful,” by Quiara Alegría Hudes.
